summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2866 for the improvement of Sixteenth Avenue South, from Beacon Avenue to Hanford Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle, by paving with asphalt laid upon a proper concrete foundation, together with the construction of brick gutters, and doing such other work as may be necessary in connection therewith, under Ordinance No. 34812, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
